name: SCP: BLOODBATH
description:
SCP BLOODBATH is an SCP fan game based on exploration. as a breach occurs you wander the facility getting closer to the exit without getting killed by the many possible ways of death. 

as of now, the game is short. playtime with developers knowledge is around 20-30 minutes.

give feedback and let me know of bugs so i can make this game better as time goes on.

SCPS included as of 0.3.0:

SCP 1499 

SCP 5555

SCP 151

SCP 261
